item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:

Thanks for the update, I've changed the post to reflect the new location.

item.title: By: Matthew Reinbold
item.dc:creator: Matthew Reinbold
item.description:
Just a heads up - it was discovered in the 11th hour that the Bombay House is closed for lunch. Things have been moved to the Brick Oven:
http://brickovenprovo.net/about_us.html
Same bat time, same bat channel.
item.content:encoded:
Just a heads up – it was discovered in the 11th hour that the Bombay House is closed for lunch. Things have been moved to the Brick Oven:
